p: In industrial technology, time is of great importance. Some studies, such as the study by Reyes, Fuentes-Aceituno, and Salinas-Rodriguez [ 1], indicate a 60 min residence time in a bath. Industrial production during which the phosphated metal stays in the bath for 60 min is insufficient. The solution with the use of accelerators shortens this time from 60 min to 15 min.
